
Homepage | ThoraxValidation period: 3/16/2023, 5:09:56 AM - 3/16/2023, 11:09:56 AM[![BMJ Journals logo](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://journals.bmj.com)[Subscribe](/pages/subscribe/)[Login](/user)[Advancedsearch](/search "Advanced Search")[![logo](/next-resources/logo.svg)](/)[Latest content](/content/early/recent)[Current issue](/content/current)[Archive](/content/by/year)[Authors](/pages/authors/)[Hosted content](https://hosted-thorax.bmj.com/?_gl=1*lhzakc*_ga*MTQ5ODI0MTg2LjE2NTMzNzYyMjM.*_ga_EXTSVLH45V*MTY1NjYwMDE5NC42MS4xLjE2NTY2MDA2ODUuNTg.*_fplc*RnJjeHVxbHNBdTFkSThGMmVacnA0aktoZ1BDaGdwRk1vbllQJTJCNXgyUm5WSGFDbldybTNUVXd4bE9UQlhIV1lXVTU2Z2p5QVpoVGRidEdabiUyRmFCNkRhYm1OdlMzR0gwc0pyejlYSHp4NXFtTzAyVHduSjRZT1hJUlptOVZ2ZyUzRCUzRA..)[Podcasts](https://soundcloud.com/bmjpodcasts/sets/thorax)[About](/pages/about/)![Search](/next-resources/search.svg)![Menu](/next-resources/hamburger-menu.svg)[Email alerts](https://myaccount.bmj.com/myaccount/signup.html?regService=etoc-alerts&corpusCode=thoraxjnl&fwdUrl=https://thorax.bmj.com/)# Thorax,
an international journal from BMJ and BTS, publishes high impact research across all areas of respiratory medicine and critical care
**Impact Factor:** 9.203  
**Citescore:** 13.3  
[All metrics >>](https://thorax.bmj.com/pages/about/)
*Thorax* is a [Plan S compliant Transformative Journal](https://authors.bmj.com/open-access/plan-s/).
*Thorax* is one of the world's leading respiratory medicine journals, publishing clinical and experimental research articles on respiratory medicine, paediatrics, immunology, pharmacology, pathology, and surgery. *Thorax* seeks to publish significant advances in scientific understanding, which are likely to impact on clinical practice. This includes articles concerning basic and translational mechanisms with application to clinical material (cell and molecular biology, genetics, epidemiology, and immunology).
*Thorax* is an official journal of the [British Thoracic Society](https://www.brit-thoracic.org.uk/) and is a companion to [BMJ Open Respiratory Research](https://bmjopenrespres.bmj.com).
**Editors-in-Chief**  
Professor Jennifer Quint, Imperial College London, UK  
Professor Mark Griffiths, Imperial College London, UK  
Professor Cecilia O'Kane, Queen's University Belfast, UK  
[Meet the editorial board](http://thorax.bmj.com/pages/editorial-board)
**Social Media and Multimedia**  
Keep up with the latest *Thorax* news on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ThoraxBMJ) and [Facebook](https://facebook.com/Thorax.BMJ/).

[Current Issue](/content/current)[![Journal Current Issue](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fthorax.bmj.com%2Fcurrent-issue%2Fcover-image-medium%2Fcover.jpg&w=384&q=75)](/content/current)## Authors
![expandable-button](/next-resources/plus-button.svg)Thorax accepts submissions of a wide range of article types, including original research, state of the art reviews and protocols.
The Author Information section provides specific article requirements to help you turn your research into an article suitable for Thorax.
Information is also provided on [editorial policies](/pages/authors/#editorial_policy) and [open access](/pages/authors/#article_processing_charges).
